title: 1. Spark an Idea
description: Start with a core concept. It can be a simple phrase like 'a robot finds a cat' or a detailed paragraph. If you're stuck, leave it blank and let the AI surprise you.

title: 2. Choose Your Style
description: Use the main dropdowns to set the creative foundation. Select a location, mood, lighting, and camera style to guide the AI's core direction.

title: 3. Refine with Advanced Settings
description: Open the 'Advanced Creative Settings' accordion to add layers of detail. Specify weather, era, special effects, and more for a highly customized scene.

title: 4. Generate Your Scene
description: Click the 'Generate Scene' button. Our AI will process your inputs to craft a series of detailed scenes and a master template for visual consistency.

title: 5. Review & Iterate
description: Analyze the generated output. Use the copy, regenerate, and delete buttons on each scene card to refine your story with precision. Provide feedback to the AI for targeted changes.

title: 6. Export & Create
description: Once you're satisfied, export your script as a JSON or formatted TXT file, ready to be used in AI video tools or shared with your creative team.
